metadata.title: CVE-2021-30823 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions. This issue is fixedin macOS Monterey 12.0.1, iOS 14.8 and iPadOS 14.8, tvOS 15, Safari 15,watchOS 8. An attacker in a privileged network position may be able tobypass HSTS.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-30823` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.34.1-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.34.1-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.34.1-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.34.1-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.34.1-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.34.1-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.34.1-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.34.1-0ubuntu0.20.04.1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
